contents:
reddit上看到的，豆瓣上有人说买书得担心，估计最近在严打吧
估计要文字狱了
或者文革

出处：https://www.reddit.com/r/saraba1st/comments/dyknyg/%E8%B1%86%E7%93%A3%E7%BD%91%E5%8F%8B%E5%9C%A8%E6%B7%98%E5%AE%9D%E6%88%96%E8%80%85%E5%AD%94%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E8%B4%AD%E4%B9%B0%E8%BF%87%E4%B8%8B%E6%9E%B6%E4%B9%A6%E7%B1%8D%E7%9A%84%E8%A6%81%E5%B0%8F%E5%BF%83%E4%BA%86/
